item.title: 「Brother Giant」 Huang Licheng's Long Position Mark-to-Market Loss Rises to $6.331 Million
item.description: On August 18th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng currently holds 22,900 long positions in ETH, 125 long positions in BTC, 100,000 long positions in HYPE, and 1 billion long positions in PUMP.The total unrealized loss is $6.331 million. Currently, his long position in ETH has an unrealized loss as high as $6.036 million.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Drops Below $116,000
item.description: On August 18th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin fell below $116,000, indicating a 24-hour decline of 1.2%.

item.title: Analyst: Ethereum Treasury Company Continues to Buy, ETH Demand Still Strong
item.description: On August 18th, David Duong, the research director of Coinbase Institutional, posted on social media, saying, "The demand for ETH is not at an end yet. Since the early part of August, the top ETH treasury reserve companies have accumulated more than 795,000 ETH (approximately $3.6 billion), and currently they are in control of more than 2% of the total supply of ETH. At the same time, the newly raised $20 billion fund by BMNR has enhanced its total purchasing power to $24.5 billion."

item.title: Trump: With Zelensky's Willingness, Conflict Could End Almost Immediately
item.description: August 18th. Trump posted on social media that if Ukrainian President Zelensky is willing, the conflict with Russia could almost come to an immediate end. Or, he could continue to fight. One should not forget how this conflict began. The Obama administration "handed over" Crimea and Ukraine was never supposed to join NATO. Some things will always remain the same. (Golden Ten)

item.title: Analyst: SOL Key Support Level at $171
item.description: On August 18th, cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts presented a chart analysis indicating that Solana (SOL) has a crucial support level at $171, with 12.4 million SOL being held at this level.

item.title: In the past 24 hours, there has been a total of $267 million in liquidations across the network, with the majority coming from long positions.
item.description: On August 18th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total network-wide position liquidation reached $267 million. There were $156 million in long liquidations and $111 million in short liquidations. A total of 78,333 individuals were liquidated. The largest single liquidation took place on Hyperliquid - ETH-USD, amounting to $9.4366 million.

item.title: Over the past 24 hours, the four-address has accumulated 580,995 LINK, worth $13.86 million.
item.description: On August 18th, as monitored by on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), four addresses accumulated 580,995 LINK within the past 24 hours, with a value of $13.86 million:· The address 0x99b...6A41E holds 273,060 LINK ($4.76 million), with a cost basis of $17.45 and an unrealized gain of $2.26 million.· The address 0x4a8...91832 holds 321,362 LINK ($4.70 million), with a cost basis of $14.62 and an unrealized gain of $3.57 million.· The address 0x4EB...3d5aF holds 721,294 LINK ($16.43 million), with a cost basis of $22.78 and an unrealized gain of $2.127 million.· The address 0xa36...f66CC holds 275,001 LINK ($5.94 million), with a cost basis of $21.63 and an unrealized gain of $1.127 million.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Drops Below $4,400
item.description: On August 18th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum fell below $4400, experiencing a 24-hour change of -0.54%.

item.title: Ark Invest's ARKK Latest Holdings Disclosure: Coinbase accounts for 6.28%, Bitmine accounts for 3.22%
item.description: On August 18th, according to Ark Invest Daily, the holdings of Cathie Wood's Ark Invest's ARKK fund as of that time show that Coinbase accounts for 6.28%, Robinhood accounts for 3.84%, Bitmine accounts for 3.22%, and Circle accounts for 3.17%.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Drops Below $117,000
item.description: On August 18th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin fell below $117,000, experiencing a 24-hour decrease of 0.58%.
